Title: WindnTrees .Core
Description:
WindnTrees.Core, a simple and consistent approach for developing data driven web applications built around CRUD (create, read, update and delete) design pattern. Applications are meant to extract, process and present data in meaningful and informative way, WindnTrees .Core solves this problem by abstracting recurring tasks and simplifies development by introducing server side CRUDs for content extraction, processing and presentation capabilities.

For software reference click here

Install WindnTrees.Core Nuget Package

WindnTrees .NET Core nuget package is available for download to implement ASP .NET Core based applications.

install-package WindnTrees.Core

Note: nuget package manager does not install windntrees.min.js in correct project scripts library directory, make sure you recover script files from C:\Users\<<Username>>\.nuget\packages\.
Author: Shams Zia

Namespaces.Name: LocaleCompare
Namespaces.Description: LocaleCompare extends CompareAttribute class and let users to decorate fields for validating comparable inputs. Override GetLocaleMessage to get a customized validation message.

Namespaces.Name: BasicController
Namespaces.Description: BasicController extends from .NET native controller and provide extended functionalities that are useful when writing a WindnTrees application. It integrates MessageRepository, JSON response methods based on object, list of objects and errors and also extends file uploading and saving functionalities.

Namespaces.Name: SearchFilter
Namespaces.Description: SearchFilter is records selection input object and can be extended for specific scenarios. In WindnTrees application user is not required to implement multiple filters for every other user input rather just rely on SearchFilter and extend for specific needs.

Namespaces.Name: FlexObject
Namespaces.Description: WindnTrees flex provides support for database driven HTML views based on FlexObject and flex field. User is not required to write server side view logic for presenting views rather view can exist within database and served directly by CRUDController using FlexGet, FlexPost, FlexList, FlexFind, FlexSelect and FlexSelectList extension methods.

Namespaces.Name: NotificationObject
Namespaces.Description: NotificationObject extends from EventArgs and used for messages or information routing during events invocations.

Namespaces.Name: ContentRepository
Namespaces.Description: ContentRepository extends from DataBaseRepository and implements InterfaceRepository for selected content type object that can be overridden in extended repository classes.

Namespaces.Name: InterfaceRepository<T>
Namespaces.Description: InterfaceRepository is a CRUD (create, read, update and delete) interface definition for implementing repository classes.

Namespaces.Name: LocaleResolver
Namespaces.Description: Abstract class for implementing data driven locale resolver instead of locale files.

Namespaces.Name: ObjectError
Namespaces.Description: Holds object and related exception message.

Components.Name: LocaleCompare
Components.Description: LocaleCompare extends CompareAttribute class and let users to decorate fields for validating comparable inputs. Override GetLocaleMessage to get a customized validation message.

Components.Name: LocaleRequired
Components.Description: LocaleRequired extends RequiredAttribute class and let users to decorate fields for validating required inputs. Override GetLocaleMessage to get a customized validation message.

Components.Name: LocaleStringLength
Components.Description: LocaleStringLength extends StringLengthAttribute class and let users to decorate fields for validating length limited inputs. Override GetLocaleMessage to get a customized validation message.

Components.Name: BasicController
Components.Description: BasicController extends from .NET native controller and provide extended functionalities that are useful when writing a WindnTrees application. It integrates MessageRepository, JSON response methods based on object, list of objects and errors and also extends file uploading and saving functionalities.

Components.Name: ContentController
Components.Description: ContentController extends BasicController and add support for obtaining generalized or typed content JSON response objects comprised of object, list and errors. A controller that does not require CRUD functionality but still need to get typed or generalized content response can benefit from ContentController.

Components.Name: CRUDController
Components.Description: CRUDController extends ContentController and add support for content extraction, processing and saving using CRUD interface. CRUDController integrates with data repository through InterfaceRepository and perform create, read, update and delete operations and implements CRUD oriented action methods for serving get, post, create, update and delete web requests.

Components.Name: SearchFilter
Components.Description: SearchFilter is records selection input object and can be extended for specific scenarios. In WindnTrees application user is not required to implement multiple filters for every other user input rather just rely on SearchFilter and extend for specific needs.

Components.Name: FlexObject
Components.Description: WindnTrees flex provides support for database driven HTML views based on FlexObject and flex field. User is not required to write server side view logic for presenting views rather view can exist within database and served directly by CRUDController using FlexGet, FlexPost, FlexList, FlexFind, FlexSelect and FlexSelectList extension methods.

Components.Name: NotificationObject
Components.Description: NotificationObject extends from EventArgs and used for messages or information routing during events invocations.

Components.Name: Notifier
Components.Description: Base class for extending or integrating event based messages notifications support in inheriting classes.

Components.Name: ContentRepository
Components.Description: ContentRepository extends from DataBaseRepository and implements InterfaceRepository for selected content type object that can be overridden in extended repository classes.

Components.Name: DataBaseRepository
Components.Description: Abstract repository class and might be extended in future.

Components.Name: EntityRepository
Components.Description: EntityRepository extends from ContentRepository and provides Entity Framework based CRUD repository implementation.

Components.Name: InterfaceRepository<T>
Components.Description: InterfaceRepository is a CRUD (create, read, update and delete) interface definition for implementing repository classes.

Components.Name: ListObject
Components.Description: List object class for displaying or storing key value pairs.

Components.Name: MessageRepository
Components.Description: Base class repository for locale messages.

Components.Name: LocaleResolver
Components.Description: Abstract class for implementing data driven locale resolver instead of locale files.

Components.Name: ObjectError
Components.Description: Holds object and related exception message.

Components.Name: PagedRecords
Components.Description: PagedRecords is a response object class with list wise content objects presentation information.

Components.Name: Result
Components.Description: Abstract class for response objects.

Components.Name: ResultList
Components.Description: ResultList extends from Result and add support for list of content objects with extended errors information.

Components.Name: ResultObject
Components.Description: ResultObject extends from Result and provides content object information in addition to error objects extended from Result abstract class.
